name: The Composer
description:
As the rebirth of the legendary Composer, it is your duty to begin to bring peace to a small village with the power of the musical ideas you effortlessly wield. Break locks, interact with villagers, and get to know the people of a world inflicted by the dreadful Silence, as you slowly work to restore order with your colorful audio collective!

WASD to move

F to interact with people

Left click to progress dialogue

Tab to open musical palette

Point and click to move samples from the lower portion of the palette to the playback area (higher portion)

Click Play Button on palette to hear music
